attributes.action: build Ice Skating Rinks and not casinos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please let Tony Blair know that we don't need any more casinos.

Instead let him know that we urgently need more ice skating rinks being built.  With the 2012 Olympics not too far off, and the lack of things for today's youth to do, this would help keep teenagers off the street.  It would also encourage children to exercise in a fun way (you don't see too many fat ice skaters!).  

Please make Tony Blair and his Government listen by signing this petition and demanding an ice skating rink be built within 20 minutes of every town.

Thank You
